title: Onnavida Song Lyrics Virumaandi
stanzas:
vaakkupada kedachaan virumaandi
satchi solla chandhiran varuvandi
sadhisanam ellaam avanthandi
ketavaram udane thandhandi

Allikodiya kaathu asaikkuthu
asaiyum kolathu kodumbu
koosudhu.
pullarichu pogum
enna polave alapaayudhu.

nilavil kaayum vetti selaiyum
namma paathu jodi serudhu
serthu vacha kaathu
thudhi paadudhu
shruthi serudhu

enna pudhu thaagam
anal aagudhe en dhegam
yaaru solli thandhu vandhadhu
kana kana vandhu kolludhu

Unkooda naan koodi
irundhida enaku jenmam
onnu podhumaa
nooru jenmam venum
adha ketkuren saamiya

nooru jenmam namaku
podhumaa vera varam
yedhum ketpamaa
saagaa varam ketpom
saamiya andha saamiya

kaathaa alanjaalum
kadalaaga nee irundhalum
aagaasamaa aana podhilum
enna uru edutha podhilum
serndhethan porakkanum
irukkanum kalakkanum

vazhka thara vandhaa virumaandi
vazhthu solla chandhiran varuvandi
sadhisanam ellaam avanthandi
ketavaram udane thandhandi
